    "number": 88207,
    "data": "0,2,7,14,24,37,52,70,90,113,139,167,198,232,268,307,348,392,439,488,540,594,651,711,773,838,906,976,1049,1124,1202,1283,1366,1452,1541,1632,1726,1822,1921,2023,2127,2234,2343,2455,2570,2687,2807,2930,3055,3183",
    "name": "a(n)=sum(k=0,n,floor(k*phi^2)) where phi=(1+sqrt(5))/2.",
    "comment": [
        "Partial sums of A001950.",
        "A001950 is the upper Beatty sequence for the constant Phi^2, where Phi = (1 + sqrt(5))/2 and the sequence is generated by floor(n*Phi). A054347 = partial sums of the lower Beatty sequence (A000201). Conjecture: a(n)/A054347(n) tends to Phi. Example: a(28)/A054347(28) = 1049/643 = 1.6314..."
    ],
    "formula": [
        "a(n) = Sum(1, n) floor(n*Phi^2)",
        "a(n) = floor( n*(n+1)/2*phi^2- n/2) +0 or +1. - Benoit Cloitre, Sep 27 2003"
    ],
    "example": [
        "A001950(1) = 2, then 5, 7, 10, 13...; partial sums are 2, 7, 14, 24, 37..."
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "a[0] = 0; a[n_] := a[n] = (a[n - 1] + Floor[n*(1 + Sqrt[5])^2/4]); Table[ a[n], {n, 1, 50}] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_ *)"
    ],
    "xref": [
        "Cf. A001950, A054347, A000201."
    ],
    "keyword": "nonn",
    "offset": "0,2",
    "author": "_Gary W. Adamson_, Sep 23 2003",
    "ext": [
        "More terms from _Robert G. Wilson v_ and _Benoit Cloitre_, Sep 27 2003"
    ],
    "references": 1,
